messages.title: Improved language support
messages.message: We have added more translations throughout the app so you can learn on edX your way!

messages.title: Download videos offline
messages.message: Easily download videos without having an internet connection, so you can keep learning when there isn’t a network around

messages.title: Reduced Network Usage
messages.message: Now you can download your content faster to get right into your next lesson!

messages.title: Learning Site Switching
messages.message: Switch more easily between multiple learning sites. Find the new options within account settings and easily manage your accounts

messages.title: Sync to calendar
messages.message: Never miss a deadline again—sync course dates to your phone's calendar to receive reminders!
